name: danganhell (2013)
description:
Page on my site --> https://freakmoch.weebly.com/dangan-rpg.html

RPG Sprites by Ci and I

DR and SDR2 sprites fresh from the game tiself

Inside Jokes and Dangan ronpa memes galore. Also a shit ton of cursing. Be warned that there may be old stupid jokes in here too idk, I'm releasing this so a friend can play it.
